content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price is €800 per month. Remember, I do not want to discuss additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs. I am only interested in the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I think €700 per month would be more reasonable for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not interested in your proposed price of €700 per month. Remember, I am only interested in the rental price. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Given that the apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities, I am willing to pay €750 per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany
